subject: Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Aksel Lund Svindal, who won three Alpine skiing medals at the last Winter Olympics and was the world champion in the downhill last year, was 0.19 of a second away from a podium finish.
snippet: Aksel Lund Svindal, who won three Alpine skiing medals at the last Winter Olympics and was the world champion in the downhill last year, was 0.19 of a second away from a podium finish.
